attributes.action: sack and charge all people involved with the death of baby p.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i am asking for 2 things,1 that all people that were involved with the death of baby p,eg police,social workers,doctors,heatlh visitors and anyone else that did not do there job right not only be sacked but be brought up on neglect charges.
and 2 that the mother,step father and lodger all be brought back to court and be given life sentances with no chance of parole.

rejection.details:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/BabyPEnquiry/
Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
